Your memory for the task below:
Trial 0:
To avoid running out of time and achieve the task of picking up the box, I should have taken a more direct path to the box. I should have turned left after the first "go forward" command to move towards the box, rather than moving forward again. This would have allowed me to reach the box before the time ran out. Additionally, I should have picked up the box as soon as I reached it, rather than waiting for the next "go forward" command. By following this revised plan, I would have been able to complete the task successfully.
Here is the task:
Achieve the "mission" as soon as possible.
